entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
